summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5690 for the improvement of 33rd Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to University View Place; by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75254, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
